overview: When the global Covid-19 pandemic breaks out and South Africa goes into hard lock down, some of the worst affected members of society are migrants and refugees, who are ineligible for government assistance. Nyasha, a lesbian migrant from Zimbabwe creates and intricate network of aid, for her fellow LGBTQIA+ migrant community: a group of people she has come to call her new family.
tagline: A woman's journey to save her family
title: Tribe
